newsitem.title: FINLAND: Outokumpu to buy Italian copper svc centre.
newsitem.headline: Outokumpu to buy Italian copper svc centre.

text.p: Finnish mining and metals group Outokumpu Oy said in a statement on Monday its Italian unit Outokumpu Centro Servizi S.p.A. will buy the copper products service centre business of Italian Societa Commerciale Metalli e Acciai (C.M.A.) S.p.A. in northern Italy.
"With the acquisition Outokumpu will further strengthen its market position and improve its service in Italy," Outokumpu said.
The service centre's activities include cutting and slitting of copper and copper alloy strip. The centre is one of the leading in its field in Italy.
Outokumpu did not give the price of the deal nor any other financial details.
